import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' function User() { const [data, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch('http://localhost:3033/users') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setData(data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }) return (
